titles.title: O Come Let Us Sing Unto The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O come let us sing unto the Lord. Let us make a joyful noise O come let us sing unto the Lord To the Rock of our salvation{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let us come before His presence With thanksgiving. Let us make a joyful noise unto Him. For the Lord is a great god,{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And Jesus is my King. O come let us sing unto the Lord.{/lang-eng}
